name: HISTOGRAMS
desc: Creates a histogram plot of x. Bins have a uniform width. Histogram displays the bins as rectangles such that the height of each rectangle indicates the number of elements in the bin.
label: Histograms

parameters.name: x
parameters.label: x
parameters.desc: A variable from database to distribute among bins.

parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: (Optional). A categorical variable from database. If not None, plots a histogram with a bar for each category in y

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
